name: dYdX
description: dYdX is a decentralized margin trading platform based on Ethereum. It helps users to borrow, lend, and make bets on the future prices of popular cryptocurrencies.

en.name: dYdX
en.description: dYdX is a decentralized margin trading platform based on Ethereum. It helps users to borrow, lend, and make bets on the future prices of popular cryptocurrencies.

fr.name: dYdX
fr.description: dYdX est une plateforme de margin trading décentralisée basée sur Ethereum. Elle aide les utilisateurs à emprunter, à prêter et à parier sur les prix futurs des crypto-monnaies les plus populaires.

es.name: dYdX
es.description: dYdX es una plataforma de comercio de margen descentralizada basada en Ethereum. Ayuda a los usuarios a pedir prestado y hacer apuestas sobre los precios futuros de las criptomonedas populares.

tr.description: dYdX, Ethereum'a dayalı merkezi olmayan bir marj ticaret platformudur. Kullanıcıların ödünç almalarına ve popüler kripto para birimlerinin gelecekteki fiyatlarına bahis yapmalarına yardımcı olur.
